description: A beautiful family house with a spacious garden.
longDescription: This stunning house offers three bedrooms, a modern kitchen, and a large backyard perfect for families. Located in a peaceful neighborhood with easy access to schools, parks, and local amenities. The property boasts high-quality finishes, energy-efficient appliances, and a secure garage.

description:
Price £400,000 to £425,000 
 Situated in popular residential road is this spacious and well-presented maisonette.
longDescription:
Situated in popular residential road is this spacious and well-presented maisonette. Occupying the ground floor of this impressive and well-maintained property, the property itself is accessed via the principle front door. The main living accommodation comprises a welcoming hallway, large living room with patio doors leading onto the patio and garden beyond; and a modern fitted kitchen also with garden access. Two large double bedrooms and a family bathroom complete the accommodation. 
 Externally is parking to the front which is shared with the flat on the first floor of the property. To the rear there are maintained and very large shared garden. 
 The ground floor maisonette comes with the added bonus of the freehold of the whole of the building. The first floor flat is held on a 500 year lease from April 2024. 
 The property itself is ideally located for Bromley North Station for London Bridge and Charing Cross via Grove Park, Shortlands Station for connections to Victoria, and Ravensbourne Station for Blackfriars. Locally there are some excellent schools including Parish (CofE), Valley and St Joseph’s (Catholic). Bromley town centre with an array of shops and restaurants is also located a short distance away. 
 Broadband and Mobile Coverage 
 For broadband and mobile phone coverage at the property in question please visit: And respectively. 
 Important note to potential purchasers:
 We endeavour to make our particulars accurate and reliable, however, they do not constitute or form part of an offer or any contract and none is to be relied upon as statements of representation or fact and a buyer is advised to obtain verification from their own solicitor or surveyor.

This bungalow features four bedrooms, a large living room, and a beautiful garden with patio. Designed with family living in mind, it includes a state-of-the-art kitchen, master suite with walk-in closet, and energy-efficient heating systems. Situated close to shopping centers and recreational facilities.

This lovely terraced house offers three bedrooms, a cozy kitchen, and proximity to local parks and schools. Features include a modern bathroom, ample storage space, and a beautifully landscaped front garden. Ideal for families seeking a comfortable and convenient lifestyle.

description: Elegant semi-detached house with modern interiors.
longDescription: This semi-detached house features four bedrooms, a modern kitchen, and a private garden area. Designed with contemporary aesthetics, it includes spacious living rooms, high ceilings, and large windows that allow natural light to flood the interiors. Perfect for families looking for style and comfort.

description: Compact studio apartment ideal for singles.
longDescription: This studio apartment offers a single bedroom, an open-plan living area, and is conveniently located near public transport. Features include modern appliances, high-speed internet connectivity, and secure entry systems. Perfect for individuals seeking a functional and stylish living space.

description: Luxury penthouse with panoramic city views.
longDescription: This penthouse offers five bedrooms, a private terrace, and top-of-the-line finishes, providing unparalleled luxury and views. Features include a gourmet kitchen, spa-like bathrooms, smart home technologies, and expansive living spaces designed for both comfort and elegance. Located in a prestigious building with exclusive amenities such as a rooftop pool, gym, and concierge services.
